title: Chainhero
author: Chainhero
content: Hi Guys,We are building a platform for securing the blockchain transaction against fraud sites and scammers. Lets say the paypal for crypto industry.Would be happy if you guys be in our community.https://t.me/chainpalshttps://twitter.com/chainpals_https://www.instagram.com/chainpals.io

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: Chainhero on October 28, 2022, 09:11:11 PMhttps://t.me/chainpalshttps://twitter.com/chainpals_https://www.instagram.com/chainpals.ioIt's better if you plan for marketing to build the community and monetize the traffic from several community. The idea and website looks good. You have to remember that it takes time to build a positive brand value which requires constant exposure to targeted audience.
